speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Master Doctor, my daughter is in

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: green. When you see your time, take her by the

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: hand; away with her to the deanery, and dispatch

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: it quickly. Go before into the park. We two must go

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: together.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: I know vat I have to do. Adieu.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Fare you well, sir.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: My husband will not rejoice so much at the abuse

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: of Falstaff as he will chafe at the doctor’s marrying

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: my daughter. But ’tis no matter. Better a little chiding

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: than a great deal of heartbreak.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: Where is Nan now, and her troop of

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: fairies, and the Welsh devil Hugh?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: They are all couched in a pit hard by

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Herne’s oak, with obscured lights, which, at the

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: very instant of Falstaff’s and our meeting, they will

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: at once display to the night.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: That cannot choose but amaze him.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: If he be not amazed, he will be

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: mocked. If he be amazed, he will every way be

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: mocked.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: We’ll betray him finely.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text:
Against
               
              such
               
              lewdsters
               
              and
               
              their
               
              lechery
              ,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text:
Those
               
              that
               
              betray
               
              them
               
              do
               
              no
               
              treachery
              .

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: The hour draws on. To the oak, to the

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: oak!
